samples.name: List Card
samples.description: The list card is used to display multiple list items of various types.

samples.name: Analytical Card
samples.description: The analytical card is used for data visualization.

samples.name: Object Card
samples.description: The object card is used to display the basic details for an object, for example, a person or a sales order.

samples.name: Timeline Card
samples.description: The timeline card is used to show time-related content.

samples.name: Table Card
samples.description: The table card is used to display multiple items in table view.

samples.name: Actions
samples.description: Actions are used to add functionality to the cards.

samples.name: Play and Explore Cards and Schema
Component Card
samples.description: The component card is used to display different types of content.

samples.name: Cards in GridContainer
samples.description: Cards can be arranged using sap.f.GridContainer.

samples.name: Card Parameters
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to use standard parameters, or define and use additional card parameters.
